channel.title: Projects on Ruthba Yasmin
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ruthba Yasmin

item.title: Project I: The Iris dataset
item.description: Data Collection and feature engineering: Collect data Prepare codebook Setup structure of the data Setup dataframe Enter data Screen data for errors. missing values, noise Exploration of data Descriptive Statistics(mean/median/mode/Standard deviation/variance/ kurtosis/frequency) Graphs(Scatterplot/Barchart/Histogram/Boxplot) Model building (Multilinear Regression/Clustering/K-mean/Classification/) Analysis Explore relationship between variables (Crosstabulation/Chi square, Correlation, Regression) Compare groups(non-parametric tests, T-tests, ANOVA) Predict the model on future test data Link to Github Repository

item.title: Chapter II: Pierre Gringoire
item.description: Nevertheless, as be harangued them, the satisfaction and admiration unanimously excited by his costume were dissipated by his words; and when he reached that untoward conclusion: “As soon as his illustrious eminence, the cardinal, arrives, we will begin,” his voice was drowned in a thunder of hooting. “Begin instantly! The mystery! the mystery immediately!” shrieked the people. And above all the voices, that of Johannes de Molendino was audible, piercing the uproar like the fife’s derisive serenade: “Commence instantly!
